item.title: Final Report | GSoC'23 @ScalaCenter
item.description: Project Information Student: Danylo Ostapchenko Organization: Scala Center Mentor: Noel Welsh Project: Data Visualization Overview Google Summer of Code 2023 is almost done, and it’s time to wrap things up. I worked on improving the Doodle library for compositional vector graphics by adding support for Data Visualization (i.e. data plotting). The project is called Chartreuse, and here’s my progress report. Work Report Add Plot representation - #5 Earlier, plots in Doodle were created from scratch.
